rev.desc.rev.desc: QCR54860 [Diagnositis counters] sm-reposrtdiagnositic
Invoke the new js method to diagnose the eventin and emailin
QCR54860 [Diagnositis counters] sm-reposrtdiagnositic
Invoke the new js method to diagnose the eventin and emailin
QCR54860 [Diagnositis counters] sm-reposrtdiagnositic
Invoke the new js method to diagnose the eventin and emailin
Panel get.operator.record
Clear $lo.ucapex if operator is not found and then continue
Removed change made for 23494. It was not necessary due to change for 30956.
devtx I3392
Added check to make sure operator is not event in check.cap panel
devtx I2952
Added panel chain from check.caps through load.ucapex to load the operator's capabilities into $lo.ucapex if $lo.ucapex is null. This happens with events.
panel check.delete
Changed the expression on the 4th line from
... sync.process in $L.register=false
to
... nullsub(sync.process in $L.register, false)=false
devtx I2979

processing synchronous events in the foreground was causing problems with $L.file.save not getting created which caused you to constantly get prompted to save changes if you processed a sync event in your client session. Made the following changes to fix this issue:
start panel I added an expression to save the original value of $G.bg:
$G.bg.save=nullsub($G.bg, true)
On the cleanup panel I then set
$G.bg=$G.bg.save
in check.delete panel, added code to make sure when event is synchronous, don't go to delete.axces
Changed the record variable to $L.reselect on the delete.axces panel (was $L.event).
Added $axces.bypass.failed.validation and $bypass.failed.validation to the list of variables to cleanup when exiting the appilcation.
set $G.bg=true
Implement message function clear and restart on start panel.
Corrected typo on panel check.email
took out the parse
parsed the expressions on run.ini before evaluating.
on panel run.init changed $L.nullsub.default back to $axces.nullsub.default.
Setup $axces.register from $L.register after selecting.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

devtx I2979

processing synchronous events in the foreground was causing problems with $L.file.save not getting created which caused you to constantly get prompted to save changes if you processed a sync event in your client session. Made the following changes to fix this issue:
start panel I added an expression to save the original value of $G.bg:
